Girl’s night out? Happily, in a couple but, but just don’t like the day? Regardless…join me at Brut to NOT celebrate Valentine’s Day. This year, it will be on Friday the 13th (even better, right?) due to the Fort George Dark Arts Festival happening on Saturday (Valentine's Day). I’ll have wine specials and some amazing treats from Astoria’s own Shuffle Truffles. Warning! The music and decorations will be dark. Bring your sense of humor. Marine Dr. Astoria, OR Hours: February 21, 2026, 10:00 am - February 21, 2026, 4:00 pm Admission: Free admission. Breakfast - $12.00 Step back in time and experience the glamour of the Roaring 1920s at the Clatsop County Historical Society’s annual Speakeasy Casino Night, happening Saturday, February 21, at the Heritage Museum, located at 16th and Exchange Streets. The secret “Black” door opens at 6:00 PM, and the excitement begins at 6:30 PM. Guests will enjoy an evening of classic casino games, including Blackjack, Roulette, Craps, and—for those feeling extra lucky—Texas Hold ’em Poker (additional buy-in required). Dress to impress in your best 1920s attire! Prizes will be awarded for the top chip holder and best costume at the end of the night. Admission & Tournament Details Northwest Lending Group is the presenting sponsor of this event. For more information, call (503) 325-2203 or email info@astoriamuseums.org. The Clatsop County Historical Society, a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, is dedicated to preserving and sharing the rich history of Clatsop County and the surrounding region. The Society operates the Flavel House Museum, Heritage Museum, Oregon Film Museum, and Uppertown Firefighters Museum. Location: The Heritage Museum -- 1618 Exchange St. Astoria, OR Hours: Saturday, February 21st --- 6:00pm - 10:00pm Admission: $20 per individual | $30 per couple Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Hours: February 22, 2026, 11:00 am - February 22, 2026, 11:00 am Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Location: Barbey Maritime Center, 2042 Marine Dr Astoria Hours: Rug Hooking dates - January 14 and 28; February 11 and 25; March 11 and 25 9:00am - 12:00pm Admission: Free with own supplies; a $40 introductory kit is available for purchase for beginner rug hookers Hours: February 25, 2026, 6:30 pm - February 25, 2026, 8:30 pm Location: Astoria Public Library 450 10th St. Hours: 2/25/2026 5:30 PM Admission: Free Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Hours: February 26, 2026, 9:00 am - February 26, 2026, 12:00 pm Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Hours: February 27, 2026, 10:30 am - February 27, 2026, 12:00 pm Location: 1483 Duane St, Astoria, OR Hours: February 1, 2026, 12:00 am - February 28, 2026, 11:59 pm Hours: February 28, 2026, 10:00 am - February 28, 2026, 12:00 pm Location: Barbey Maritime Center, 2042 Marine Dr Astoria Hours: Saturday, February 28 9:00am - 12:30pm
